name: Get Fit with Mel B
overview: Finally, the personalized health and fitness program you've always wanted in a way you've never dreamed possible. Wii Motion Plus technology makes it possible. You and Mel B. make it FUN and EFFECTIVE. Personal trainer, nutrition coach, and motivator: Mel B is here for YOU. Train right alongside a leading fitness personality in Get Fit with Mel B! Join the the celebrity trainer for a program that combines a vigorous workout with a full wellness experience. Using the Wii's motion controls, you'll train onscreen, right next to Mel. The game uses a custom-built body-detection system to monitor your movements, letting Mel deliver real-time feedback, motivation, and advice. Pick from a range of activities, including cardio, step, pump and tone, kickboxing, and dance-fit. But Get Fit doesn't let up once the workout's over. Use the personal nutrition program to see meal plans and search 140 recipes designed to help you reach your wellness goals.
